title: <2017> Counter-Strike 1.6 RFW [ Ready For War ]
description:
Counter-Strike 1.6 RFW ( ready for war ) is a modification of the legenday FPS game , called Counter-Strike 1.6. In this client game kit , there are many updates which will help you to play at the best experience . Now the game launch more faster than other game kits !

This modification is unpacking original files on game startup , so all slowhack methods are blocked !

The modifications which was made on this game are :
   - The size of the archive , just 251MB HDD space , more less than other client game s!
   - The skins of the weapons was modified for a better experience and for a good game
   - There is no redirect , all is default , you  can select your server on which you want to play
   - The internet server list is updated weekly
   - Guard against slowhack protection , such as commands send by the server or any miscelaneous files
   - One game launcher , other can be added easily.
   - 100% more faster than other client game kits
   - 100% you will have a higher FPS and on the worst pc
   - The game comes with the latest bots

This game looks like Counter-Strike:Global Offensive , but this is more attractive and more good for all veterans of FPS games .
I hope so you'll enjoy this game and will share with your friends :)

Remember : The game is based on the original Counter-Strike 1.6 game , just skins was modified and the aspect of the game . Guard and unpacker was added by for a good protection and for a good game ! Enjoy !


ScreenShots :http://imgur.com/a/im9PL
